animeDescription: The story will revolve around how the Avengers—Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, and the Hulk together with the help of Spider-Man and a group of teens—will harness their respective fighting skills and superhuman powers to foil Loki's scheme to take over the world. Marvel Disk Wars: The Avengers will target boys in the 6-12 age group.  (Source: Marvel)
animeRelated: ['Avengers Confidential: Black Widow to Punisher', 'Marvel Future Avengers']
